message:
[Python] Guys , I have a python object that I want to serialize to json , what is the best way to go ? I need the serializer to be able to deal with unicode (Arabic characters for example).
I have tried to use json.dump but it fails with some Arabic characters
This is the error I got : 
'ascii' codec can't decode byte 0xd8 in position 1: ordinal not in range(128)
The project is small and opensource , you view the code from here

https://github.com/AhmedKamal/Shokran/blob/master/main.py
